entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who answers Harry's knock on his door. He is described as wearing a horrible hairy brown suit and a checked yellow-and-orange tie, with his hair slicked down into two bunches.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who knocks on Hagrid's door. He is not described in detail but is mentioned as part of a group referred to as 'you lot'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as part of the group that knocks on Hagrid's door. She starts to say something but then stops dead, looking up at Hagrid.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is introduced as the one who answers Harry's knock on Hagrid's door with his booming barks.

relationships.description: Hermione looks up at Hagrid, apparently lost for words.
